title: Amazon Sponsored Brands Campaign Daily Report
description: Daily performance report for an Amazon Sponsored Brands Campaign

Date.description: Epoch timestamp representing the date of the report

Portfolio_name.description: Name of the portfolio associated with the campaign

Currency.description: Currency code for the financial values in the report

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the Sponsored Brands Campaign

Country.description: Country where the campaign is running

Cost_Per_Click__CPC.description: Cost per click in the specified currency

Spend.description: Total spending on the campaign in the specified currency

Total_Advertising_Cost_of_Sales__ACOS.description: Advertising Cost of Sales (ACOS) as a percentage

14_Day_Total_Sales_.description: Total sales in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Orders__#.description: Total number of orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units__#.description: Total number of units sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_Conversion_Rate.description: Conversion rate for the last 14 days as a percentage

Click-Through_Rate_for_Views__vCTR.description: Click-through rate for views as a percentage

Video_First_Quartile_Views.description: Number of views at the first quartile of the video

Video_Midpoint_Views.description: Number of views at the midpoint of the video

Video_Third_Quartile_Views.description: Number of views at the third quartile of the video

Video_Complete_Views.description: Number of complete views of the video

Video_Unmutes.description: Number of times the video was unmuted

5_Second_Views.description: Number of views lasting at least 5 seconds

14_Day_Branded_Searches.description: Number of branded searches in the last 14 days

14_Day_Detail_Page_Views__DPV.description: Number of detail page views in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Orders__#.description: Number of new-to-brand orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_%_of_Orders_New-to-brand.description: Percentage of orders that are new-to-brand in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Sales.description: Sales from new-to-brand orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_%_of_Sales_New-to-brand.description: Percentage of sales that are new-to-brand in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Units__#.description: Number of new-to-brand units sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_%_of_Units_New-to-brand.description: Percentage of units sold that are new-to-brand in the last 14 days

14_Day_New-to-brand_Order_Rate.description: Order rate for new-to-brand orders in the last 14 days as a percentage
